channel.title: Vote4Cash Mysql Error
channel.description:
I continue to receive this error:
[code]Could not connect to mysql database: Access denied for user 'revealedx_votee'@'localhost' (using password: YES)[/code]
It was working perfectly fine, now it doesn't. I re-did my entire db, re-uploaded the vote.php, and it still is giving me the same error. The username does have all privileges..
